name: Pool (T. M. P. Vahle)
overview: A pool game by M. Vahle, T. Vahle and P. Vahle, relased in 1987. To play, aim the cue ball by moving the mouse. The cute ball will go in the direction of the line radiating from the cute ball and will have a velocity proportional to its length. Click left mouse button to shoot. After all the balls are sunk or the cue ball is scratched, press left mouse button to continue. Click outside the table to end. Released on Software 2000 Vol1 Set2.
